newsitem.title: USA: U.S. stocks shed early gains, now trace lower.
newsitem.headline: U.S. stocks shed early gains, now trace lower.

text.p: U.S. stocks shed early gains and moved slightly lower in early trading on Thursday despite a strong bond market.
The Dow Jones industrial average fell from an earlier session high, up about 20 right after the opening, and was off 3.85 to 6,444.42.
The Standard & Poor's 500 and Nasdaq also moved into negative territory, with the S&P index off 0.7 to 740 and the Nasdaq Composite off 0.8 to 1290.2.
